controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class GameController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller contains an action to handle HTTP requests to the application's home page.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public play.mvc.Result index()
        Default for /game. Starts a new game or redirects the logged in user to the fitting part of his current game.
        Returns:
        Renders a page to start a new game or redirects to a quiz or a minigame according to the progress of the game.

      • startGame

        public play.mvc.Result startGame()
        Handles POST requests for /game. Gets called when a user starts a game.
        Returns:
        Redirects to first stage of the game, i.e. a quiz.
